text: Valentino Castellani (born 19 March 1940) is an Italian politician. He was the independent Mayor of Turin from 24 June 1993 to 1 June 2001. Castellani was born in Varmo, Italy. From 1999 to 2006, he was President of the International Olympic Committee. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Turin Category:Presidents of the International Olympic Committee
title: Valentino Castellani
